name: PROGRESSCenter'sDailyFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The PROGRESS Center shares daily tips, strategies, and supports to effectively work with children with disabilities. The PROGRESS Center (which stands for Promoting Rigorous Outcomes and Growth by Redesigning Educational Services for Students With Disabilities Center) is an organization that provides information, resources, tools, and technical assistance services to support local educators and leaders (kindergarten through transition age) in developing and implementing high-quality educational programs that ensure students with disabilities have access to a free appropriate public education (FAPE).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
